Author: Dawns_Xu
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Newton: Infrastructure for the Community Economy
Body: Happy â€˜NEWâ€™ Year: Newtonâ€™s 1st Airdrop Newton, started on December 25, 2017, turns a year old on Christmas. In this year, we have published our white paper, exchanged tokens, launched MainNet, and reached major milestones in business cooperation. NewMall, our first application, is coming soon. None of these successes would be possible without the support of our community members.  In order to give back to the community, Newton is planning its first airdrop to community members who have passed KYC verification as of UTC 24:00, December 8, 2018. Because of the large number of applicants, however, in the end, 11,251 members were not able to participate in the token exchange. Each member will receive 5,000 NEW.  From UTC 6:00 on December 26, 2018, we will send an email with the subject â€œHappy â€˜NEWâ€™ Yearâ€ to everyone receiving the airdrop. Please log into the Newton website user center as directed in the email and enter your NEW address.  The deadline of filling in your NEW address is UTC 24:00 January 7th, 2019. If you are unable to complete before the deadline, you will be deemed as automatically waiving the tokens.  The NEW airdrop has two phases.  -  For users who submit their NEW addresses before UTC 24:00 on December 30, 2018, the airdrop will take place from UTC 2:00 TO 16:00 on December 31, 2018.  -  For users who submit their NEW addresses from 24:00 on December 30, 2018 to 24:00 on January 7, 2019,the airdrop will take place from UTC 2:00 to 16:00 from January 8, 2019.  Receiving your airdrop tokens:  1. First log into the website (https://www.newtonproject.org) and download NewPay.  2. Create your wallet and prepare a hint.  3. Your NEW receipt address: Wallet > Receive > Copy Address  4. Fill in NEW address: Use your Newton account to log into the user center, and input your NEW address as prompted. Carefully verify the address before entering it. If you write the address incorrectly, you wonâ€™t receive your NEW.  Note: All the tokens to be issued in airdrop will be suppplied by the Newton Foundation, the Newton Foundation reserves the right to interpret this announcement.     Sincerely,     Newton  December 25, 2018

Author: Dawns_Xu
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Newton: Infrastructure for the Community Economy
Body: Newton Weekly | 2019.1.7-2019.1.13  â Technical Progress  1. Interface integration for on-chain transactions, mining, personal center, and community node modules completed for NewPay Version 1.0, and test cases compiled.  2. Node and transaction locking and GNF NewForce integration support added for NewChain.  3. Design of UI master vision and optimized supply chain back-end goods delivery functional module completed for NewMall.  â Team News  1. On January 11th, 2019, Newton founder Xu Jizhe interacted with the English Newton Telegram community and answered questions curated by Moonetize, the rotating group manager, including â€œWhy is Newton starting official OTC trading,â€ and â€œWhat is Newtonâ€™s plan for the next five year?â€ For more information, please visit https://www.reddit.com/r/Newton_project/comments/afhk3n/moonetize_team_ama_interview_with_newton_founder/.  2. On January 11th, 2019, Xu communicated with the entire team at NewSpace-Sanlitun on project development and the plan for the next few months. The staff gained a better understanding of their individual work responsibilities and project progress.  3. On January 10th, Xu met with offline merchant representatives in NewSpace-Sanlitun, and arranged for the NewMall team to communicate with them on technology for NewMall product launches.  â Community News  1. The fourth rotating Chinese community rotating management team has finished its term. The events organized by the Moon Spark and the BC Spark & Sea Team inviting Newtonâ€™s institutional supporters to share and rank groupsâ€™ activity were welcomed by all.  2. The first rotating management period for the English community was completed smoothly. The Moonetize team, from Turkey organized small tests and founder AMA sessions, giving the community a more in-depth understanding of the project in a relaxed setting.  3. On the 11th, upon invitation by the Newton Chinese community rotating management team, JLAB â€“ an important Newton supporter â€“ and the founder of Genesis Capital participated in a Newton Q&A session, sharing their views on the project.  4. The second batch of the first Newton airdrop was completed on January 8th . 675 community members received 5,000 NEW.  5. The New Shine team of Newton community members established the Newton community  group in the Huoxin. The community operations have been steadily carried out, and the members have been continued to expand. After breaking through the 3,000-person mark last week,  group member amount reached 5,000 on the evening of January 13. The team is committed to building a warm and harmony community, helping new members to know more about Newton by various activities.  To help community members gain a deeper understanding of Newton and exchange community operations experience, the New Shine team has compiled all the important information about Newton project since its inception, covering Newton's white papers, founder interviews, media reports, and community awareness. The content will continue to be updated.  6. To faciliate Newton English community member trading, English community OTC market officially opened, welcome to join https://t.me/newtonotc.  â Media News  Outlets including ReadCEO carried an interview with Xu this week: â€œBlockchain Infrastructure Ultimately Serves the People.â€   https://www.newtonproject.org/announcement/2019/01/13/newton-weekly-201917-2019113/

Author: Dawns_Xu
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Newton: Infrastructure for the Community Economy
Body: ã€ê«›ê«€êªã€‘Monday, 5 November, 2018   1. Newton advisor Theodore Gray arrived in China yesterday and will work in NewSpace Sunlitun for a week. 2. The Newton technology framework consists of three layers: the basic technology layer, the hyper exchange protocol layer, and the application layer. The basic technology layer includes NewChain, NewNET, Atom Hashing, NewIoT and NewAI; the hyper exchange protocol layer includes digital identity and credit, supply chain, digital marketing, transactions and payments, trusted physical channels, supply chain, NNIO, etc. The application layer includes wallets, malls, logistics, finance and insurance. We will develop a series of basic technologies to support the hyper exchange protocol, which is the basic commercial protocol cluster supporting higher-level application operations. (Excerpt from Newton's website) 3. According to The Business Standard, HSBC India is using blockchain technology to deal with overseas trade. 4. According to CNN, IBM has applied for a patent for an AR system based on blockchain technology.   Have a great day! â˜•ï¸ â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€” https://www.facebook.com/newtonproject/ Follow us on Facebook!

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Newton: Infrastructure for the Community Economy
Body: ã€ê«›ê«€êªã€‘   Tuesday, 6 November, 2018   1. Yesterday afternoon, Newton founder Xu Jizhe, advisors Theodore Gray and Dr. Hu Dinghe and others wrapped up shooting a series of marketing videos for Newton PR. 2. Last night, Newton Community learning organization 'Jixia Newton' organized an online workshop, inviting a special lecturer from Wudaokou Financial College to share 'the Fourth Paradigm and Blockchain Innovation' as well as discussing Newton's white paper. 3. Digital Identity and Credit: Users can manage and control access to their digital assets with a digital identity. Digital assets include cryptocurrencies, personal data, personal credit and anything that exists in a binary format and comes with the right to use. Users can control and set different privacy modes for corresponding digital assets, and price them. (Excerpt from Newton's website) 4. Recently, Martin Hellman, an expert in public key cryptography, said that security technologies such as blockchain are useful for protecting science. 5. Glen Wely, an economist at Microsoft Research in New York, said the blockchain could be a major support against the next recession. https://t.me/newtonprojectchinese  Newton Super Node plan ready to start  NewtonProject will announce SuperNode Plan after the mainnet publish  Nowï¼Œwe are look for some potential SuperNodes in our Community  What do you need to do as a SuperNode? As a SuperNode, your task will be to look after and help Newton grow. At the moment, we need help in the following areas: * Help new comers understand NewtonProject * Respond to usersâ€™ questions and comments * Test and give early feedback for beta versions * Assist in organizing online and offline events and meet-ups * Help Newton maintain and moderate online and offline communities * Help Newton translate and proofread content * Provide Newton with market feedback and suggestions * Any other suggestions that you think will help Newton grow  NewtonProjectâ€™s consensus is PoCï¼ˆproof of contributionï¼‰ So,Newton will according to the detail contribution of different SuperNode,give different rewards  If you are interested be a SuperNode of Newton or have some questions about it , please feel free to connect us

Author: Dawns_Xu
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Newton: Infrastructure for the Community Economy
Body: Newton Weekly | 2018.10.08-2018.10.14 â Technical Progress  1 NewChainâ€™s main network related service architecture, security architecture, network architecture design and verification have all been completed  2 Development has wrapped up on NewPayâ€™s NewID, and a prototype for NewPuzzle has been developed and is entering the integration test phase.  3 NewExplorer has introduced a number of holdings.  4 Portuguese, Croatian and Bulgarian white papers and a Community Voice section have been added to Newtonâ€™s website. Some page updates have also been completed.  5 Newtonâ€™s website back-end analytics system has added new traffic analysis, community analysis, full-text search, and other functions.  â Team News  1. Xu Jizhe, the founder of Newton, met with Newtonâ€™s Korean community members to discuss cooperation on 8 October.  2. This week, Mr Xu spoke with team members and deployed the optimization of Newton's ecosystem incentive mechanism, Newton Super Node Summit, Newton main network progress, NewMall overall progress, and other matters.  3. Newtonâ€™s Advisor, Theodore Gray, will attend the 2018 Mars Blockchain New York Summit on October 18. The theme of the summit is NEXT STEP and it will focus on topics such as the blockchain economic model, policy regulation, market dynamics and development direction for in-depth exchange, so as to brainstorm ideas and build consensus.  Mr. Gray will present the innovative and applied prospects of the Newton Project in the panel on public chain governance and applications.  â Community News  1. Newtonâ€™s Global 100 Cities Tour - Tokyo Station, organized by the BlockTec team, will be held from 18:30-20:30 on October 23. Mr. Xu will attend and deliver a speech, and later attend a series of events in Tokyo.  2. This week, Newton started Vietnamese, Indonesian and German Telegram groups. Currently, Newton has 43 social media groups from 24 countries and regions around the world. We welcome more friends to join us in building a global community.  â Media News  1. This week, Talking Blockchain, a blockchain media outlet, published an interview video and article on Xu Jizhe, entitled Xu Jizhe - The Essence of Blockchain is to Scale Up Fair and Reasonable Distribution Mechanisms, which elaborates on the economic infrastructure of the Newton Project.  2. This week, international media such as Cryptonea comprehensively reported on the Newton Project, focusing on Newton's technical advantages and ecosystem, and systematically explaining Newton's hyper exchange protocol.     Contact us  You can learn about the latest news of Newton project through the following links:  Newton official websiteï¼šhttps://www.newtonproject.org/ Twitterï¼šhttps://www.twitter.com/newton_project Facebookï¼šhttps://www.facebook.com/newtonproject Telegram Englishï¼šhttps://t.me/Newtonproject Telegram Chineseï¼šhttps://t.me/newtonprojectchinese Google Groupï¼šhttps://groups.google.com/forum/#!aboutgroup/newton-universe Mediumï¼šhttps://medium.com/@newtonproject Redditï¼šhttps://www.reddit.com/user/newtonproject/ Weibo: http://weibo.com/newtonproject
